apihelp-wikilambda_fetch-summary: Fetch the JSON model of ZObjects.
apihelp-wikilambda_fetch-param-zids: The ZObject ZIDs to fetch, seperated by pipes.
apihelp-wikilambda_fetch-example-multipl: Fetch three ZObjects: Z1, Z2, and Z3.
apierror-wikilambda_fetch-missingzid: The given ZID '$1' does not exist on this wiki.
